data.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
data.author: Helen Keller

data.quote: My best friend is the one who brings out the best in me.
data.author: Henry Ford

data.quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
data.author: Benjamin Franklin

data.quote: Look at the sky. We are not alone. The whole universe is friendly to us and conspires only to give the best to those who dream and work.
data.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

data.quote: In any moment of decision, the best thing you can do is the right thing, the next best thing is the wrong thing, and the worst thing you can do is nothing.
data.author: Theodore Roosevelt

data.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
data.author: Theodore Roosevelt

data.quote: At his best, man is the noblest of all animals; separated from law and justice he is the worst.
data.author: Aristotle

data.quote: In the practice of tolerance, one's enemy is the best teacher.
data.author: Dalai Lama

data.quote: The only real failure in life is not to be true to the best one knows.
data.author: Buddha

data.quote: The best cure for the body is a quiet mind.
data.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

data.quote: Education is the best provision for old age.
data.author: Aristotle

data.quote: The best road to progress is freedom's road.
data.author: John F. Kennedy

data.quote: Life is about making an impact, not making an income.
data.author: Kevin Kruse

data.quote: Two roads diverged in a wood, and I—I took the one less traveled by, And that has made all the difference.
data.author: Robert Frost

data.quote: Life is what happens to you while you’re busy making other plans.
data.author: John Lennon

data.quote: We become what we think about.
data.author: Earl Nightingale

data.quote: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
data.author: Og Mandino

data.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
data.author: Chinese Proverb

data.quote: An unexamined life is not worth living.
data.author: Socrates

data.quote: Eighty percent of success is showing up.
data.author: Woody Allen

data.quote: Every child is an artist.  The problem is how to remain an artist once he grows up.
data.author: Pablo Picasso

data.quote: You can never cross the ocean until you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.
data.author: Christopher Columbus

data.quote: Either you run the day, or the day runs you.
data.author: Jim Rohn

data.quote: The best revenge is massive success.
data.author: Frank Sinatra

data.quote: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.
data.author: Anais Nin

data.quote: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don’t matter and those who matter don’t mind.
data.author: Dr. Seuss

data.quote: Do your own thing on your own terms and get what you came here for.
data.author: Oliver James
